description: The Men's Drop Line Jacket will be your new cozy companion to check off all your chilly weather to-dos. This lightweight sweater fleece breathes easy on pre-work espresso or trail runs and post-work dog walks and sunset hikes. You can even comfortably layer this versatile fleece under your ski jacket thanks to chafe-reducing flat-locked seams. When the weekend arrives, zip it over your classy cocktail attire or brewery-casual garb for date nights and fall weekend fun.
name: Marmot Drop Line Jacket - Mens
